thread.title: Judge denies summary judgment in Southwest LRT case
thread.title_full: Judge denies summary judgment in Southwest LRT case

author: Cali Owings
title: Judge denies summary judgment in Southwest LRT case
text:
Apartment Sales Tracker Home / News / Judge denies summary judgment in Southwest LRT case The Kenilworth Corridor is a narrow recreational corridor between Cedar Lake and Lake of the Isles in Minneapolis, where light rail trains are planned to run below ground in a shallow tunnel. (File photo: Bill Klotz) Judge denies summary judgment in Southwest LRT case By: Cali Owings August 5, 2015 10:02 am 0 A federal judge has ruled that the Metropolitan Council was within its rights to seek municipal approvals for the future Southwest Light Rail Transit line before updated environmental reviews were made available. But the decision does not end the case. User Name/E-mail: Password:
